title: Colony
description: An erotic, science fiction tale of betrayal and rebirth (sneak peek)"In the instant before he lifted her face to his strange puckered mouth she saw them. Stripes of brown and orange all over his body, and a dozen suction caps lined his chest..."Allandra has always dreamed of life on other planets. But this mission she'll find more than she ever dreamed of. From the mind of Valjeanne Jeffers, author of Immortal, comes an erotic tale that's out of this world. Cover art and design by Quinton Veal. Look for the full novel of Colony: A Space Opera later this year!
author: Valjeanne Jeffers
